hero.headline: GlobalSoft — Your Idea, Our Tech Care.
hero.companyBody: Founded in 2010, GlobalSoft (ID: 400006051) was established with a clear vision: to make your dreams and ambitions come true in a realistic, streamlined, and innovative way. Our mission is to contribute to local innovation and the broader technological ecosystem, while proudly supporting the global export of Georgian services. From full-cycle web and mobile app development to custom systems and reliable IT support, we offer comprehensive tech solutions. At the heart of our work are our values: fairness, professionalism, and affordability. With proven expertise in system architecture, design-oriented thinking, and complex solution engineering, we deliver tailored, high-quality results aligned with each client’s unique goals.

items.title: Frontend Development
items.body: We design and develop responsive, user-friendly interfaces that deliver seamless interactions and engaging digital experiences.

items.title: Backend Development
items.body: We develop powerful, secure, and scalable backend systems that ensure smooth data processing, streamlined integrations, and optimal performance for your applications.

items.title: Web Development
items.body: We create dynamic, secure, and scalable web solutions tailored to your business needs, enhancing your online presence and boosting user engagement.

items.title: IOS/Android Development
items.body: We build high-performance, feature-packed mobile apps for iOS and Android, ensuring seamless functionality and user satisfaction.

portfolioTeaser.title: Websites We  Made
portfolioTeaser.body: Explore our portfolio of expertly crafted websites, designed to deliver smooth user experiences thanks to their robust functionality and modern aesthetics.

whatWeDo.title: What We Are Doing
whatWeDo.intro: At GlobalSoft, we specialize in delivering advanced software solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of your business. Our expertise spans Frontend Development, Backend Development, iOS/Android Development, and Web Development. Our team provides you with seamless, high-performance digital experiences. From creating intuitive user interfaces, building robust server-side infrastructures to developing mobile and web applications, our team of experienced professionals is consistently delivers innovation and excellence.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.desc: We design and develop responsive, user-friendly interfaces that deliver seamless interactions and engaging digital experiences.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.desc: We develop powerful, secure, and scalable backend systems that ensure smooth data processing, streamlined integrations, and optimal performance for your applications.

web.title: Web Development
web.desc: We create dynamic, secure, and scalable web solutions tailored to your business needs, enhancing your online presence and boosting user engagement.

mobile.title: iOS/Android Development
mobile.desc: We build high-performance, feature-packed mobile apps for iOS and Android, ensuring seamless functionality and user satisfaction.

who.title: Who We Are
who.body: We are a dedicated team of skilled professionals committed to delivering high-quality software development solutions. Our professionals excel in frontend and backend development, iOS/Android app creation, and web solutions, collaborating to create innovative and efficient digital products. With a strong focus on precision, creativity, and cutting-edge technology, we ensure that every project meets the highest standards of performance and usability. At GlobalSoft, our passion for excellence drives us to turn challenges into opportunities, helping your business thrive in the digital landscape!

precision.title: Precision
precision.text: Rigorous engineering and clear processes that lead to dependable results.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: Creative solutions powered by modern tools, patterns, and architectures.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.text: Secure, scalable, and maintainable systems that stand the test of time.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Websites We Made
portfolio.intro: Explore our portfolio of expertly crafted websites, designed to deliver smooth user experiences thanks to their robust functionality and modern aesthetics. The dynamic business platforms and pioneering web applications created by our team ensure that your projects meet the highest standards of quality, performance, and innovation. Each website we develop is tailored to your unique needs and combines intuitive design with powerful technology to guarantee your success in the digital world.

globalcellMe.title: GlobalCell Me
globalcellMe.desc: GlobalCell.me Is the ultimate personal account hub for GlobalCell users, designed and developed by our team for seamless and hassle-free global connectivity. This powerful platform empowers users to effortlessly manage their international SIM cards, top up balances, track usage in real time, and purchase the best roaming data packages - all in one intuitive dashboard.

globalcellGe.title: GlobalCell.ge
globalcellGe.desc: GlobalCell.ge Is a Georgian-licensed Mobile and Fixed Telecommunication Operator as well as one of the largest distributors of international SIM cards offering European, Georgian, British, and American phone numbers with free incoming calls and affordable roaming internet packages.

globalcellBusiness.title: GlobalCell Business
globalcellBusiness.desc: GlobalCell.Business Was developed to provide a dedicated corporate account portal, designed to simplify global telecom management for businesses. Tailored for enterprises, Globalcell.Business was carefully developed by our team to equip Globalcell users with seamless control over multiple international SIM cards, enabling effortless team-wide connectivity. Companies can allocate resources, track usage, manage top-ups, and optimize roaming plans—all from a single, intuitive platform. With powerful analytics and centralized account management, GlobalCell.Business helps businesses stay connected globally while maintaining full cost control.
